training.Train module¶

Training and validation code for bddmodelcar.

training.Train.iterate(net, loss_func, optimizer=None, input=None, truth=None, mask=None, train=True)[source]¶

Encapsulates a training or validation iteration.

Parameters:
  • net – <nn.Module>: network to train
  • optimizer – <torch.optim>: optimizer to use
  • input – <tuple>: tuple of np.array or tensors to pass into net. Should contain data for this iteration
  • truth – <np.array | tensor>: tuple of np.array to pass into optimizer. Should contain data for this iteration
  • mask – <np.array | tensor>: mask to ignore unnecessary outputs.
Returns:

loss
training.Train.main()[source]¶

Main training loop
